Text:
function ERI_EP04_05()
    --.起-3【11月第2週】「急襲！ 姫神エルメス！」
    SaveData.Title = "急襲！ 姫神エルメス！"

    --//BG：和室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ That day, the whole academy was buzzing with talk about Hermes all day long. ]])

    MSG([[ Actually, Hermes usually only appears at the academy for her duties as a 'Princess,' and this was the first time in a year that she attended classes all day. ]])

    MSG([[ Of course, people would crowd around Hermes' classroom during breaks. Some even started skipping classes just to go see her during lessons. ]])

    MSG([[ After school, when Lira, Uran, and I gathered in the Japanese-style room to exchange the information we'd heard, we were all troubled by how serious the situation was beyond our expectations. ]])
    --//BU：リラ（苦笑）、ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0461.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "In my class, one person even faked being sick to go see Senior Hermes during class, and never came back." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0997.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-They’re just fainting and sleeping in the infirmary, right? That’s right, isn’t it?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "There have been ten faintings caused by Lady Hermes just today alone. It seems to be affecting mainly the lower-class students who have weaker resistance." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It was good that we prepared an empty classroom as a temporary infirmary yesterday." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0998.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes, what Uran said was spot on. Honestly, I underestimated just how influential Hermes-san is." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I thought I understood she was an amazing person, but it’s to this extent. ]])

    MSG([[ But come to think of it, the sight of a national idol attending classes is priceless—no amount of money could buy it. ]])

    MSG([[ So it makes sense that people would fake being sick to see her. And that some would faint from how cute she is. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0462.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Also, this is something I personally heard. There were a few reporters sneaking in wearing uniforms inside the school." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0999.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!? Is that really okay!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0463.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Yeah. It seems it was okay... at least until they were all caught and kicked out by Senior Daria." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0464.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "She apparently remembers every student’s name and face, so I guess it was easy for her. That’s our disciplinary committee head for you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It seems Daria appeared again as a guard for Lady Hermes." ]])

    MSG([[ From the way she caught the reporters, it was clear Daria was protecting Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ In fact, when we tried to approach Hermes today, we were skillfully intercepted and couldn’t get close. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I’ve never seen Daria surrounded by such an unapproachable atmosphere before. What could it mean?" ]])

    --//BU：リラ（苦笑）、エルメス（笑顔）、ウラン（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Well now, what could it mean, I wonder<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Now! Lira, please give us your answer!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0465.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Eh!? Uh, um, i-it’s got to be... her period?" ]])
    --//SE：不正解音（ﾌﾞﾌﾞｰ）
PLAY_SE("SEz001.wav")
WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0202.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "No no no! That answer isn’t cute! Such graphic answers don’t go over well with the general public and get cut from the broadcast. Remember, this is national TV, okay?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0466.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I-I'm sorry..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0203.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Now for the second question<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Ta-da<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0204.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The Japanese word 'pudding' comes from a certain country's word 'pudding.' What country is that?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0205.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Yes! Erika was quick!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1000.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!? I-I didn’t raise my hand!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0206.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "3! 2! 1!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-It’s Fr— no! Italy!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0207.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The answer is~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes went silent. We all held our breath, waiting for her next words. ]])

    MSG([[ Finally, those pink lips parted— ]])
    --//SE：不正解音（ﾌﾞﾌﾞｰ）
WAIT(200)
PLAY_SE("SEz001.wav")
WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0208.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Nooooooooooooo! The correct answer was Britain!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0209.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ah, that was close, so close<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I was super nervous too~" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Britain, huh." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0299.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "We learned another lovely piece of Western knowledge<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("mix_0013")
    MSG([[
    【All】
 "Ahahahahahahaha" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG022ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-500,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07ga")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0468.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Wait... Why is Senior Hermes here right nowーーーーーーーーーー!!!???" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira’s loudest retort ever echoed through the Japanese-style room. ]])

    MSG([[ Because of the long pause, her voice was even louder. I got caught up in it and somehow felt sorry. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG022aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0469.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "No one was making any retorts, so I started getting anxious. Though I’m partially to blame for just going along with it at first." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "S-Sorry... You just started talking as if it was normal, so I couldn’t cut in." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0211.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Hehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> This is the ninja art of interrupting conversations<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0301.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes, Lady Hermes, here’s your tea. Is there something you need from us?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0212.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Thank you, Uran-chan<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I love you! Hehe, actually, I came to ask everyone for a favor<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes took a sip of tea, then continued with a serious expression. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0213.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Would you go on dates with me on holidays until graduation?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "D-Date? With you, Hermes-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ We tilted our heads in confusion at the unexpected request. ]])

    MSG([[ But Hermes looked completely serious. She didn’t seem to be teasing us. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-Well, I don’t mind at all. But why would you make such a request?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0214.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Because wherever I go, reporters and bodyguards follow me, so I can’t have fun." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0215.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I even stopped entertainment activities and started living alone to make memories in Yuriai Private Academy, but having no freedom isn’t cute!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0470.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah... Well, it is a crazy family that even sends her off by helicopter." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0302.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Could it be that you’re able to meet us now by slipping past theMonitoring eyes?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0216.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "That’s right... I timed it so everyone else, the knights, would be running over, and shook off my watchers." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0217.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Daria-chan is especially a formidable opponent. She’s watching me on Mother’s orders so I don’t talk or hang out with others." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0218.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I love Daria-chan, but I want to play and talk with everyone too!" ]])
    -- //CI：090
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_ERI03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,-50)
    SET_CUTIN_01_M(100, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0219.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "So please! Help me go on dates with everyone!" ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_01(100, 500)

    MSG([[ Hermes clasped her hands together as if praying to us. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira, Uran, and I exchanged glances at her unexpected request, unsure how to respond. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if we say we’ll cooperate, what should we do? We couldn’t tell if we could really be of help and struggled to give an answer. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0203.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Hermes, you’re in this room, aren’t you? Open the door." ]])
    -- //声小さめ

    MSG([[ Daria’s voice came from outside, urging us on. ]])

    MSG([[ It seemed Hermes had quickly jammed a stick to block the door, making it difficult to open. ]])

    MSG([[ But knowing Daria, she would easily force the door open. We needed to decide immediately. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (There’s no doubt. If we’re on a date, Daria-san won’t interfere, so we can talk!) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ We could think about how to rescue Hermes from surveillance later. Right now, maintaining this precious connection with her was the top priority. ]])

    MSG([[ And above all— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0220.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ugh..." ]])

    MSG([[ —She wants to make memories in her final days at the academy. Hearing such a heartfelt wish, there was no way I could refuse to help as a fellow student and as a man. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes-san, leave it to me. I’ll help you make memories as many times as you want." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "R-Really!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0471.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Erika beat me to it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0472.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I’ll definitely help too. I’ll write down our SNS IDs on paper, so let’s have a strategy meeting tonight." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0303.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hehe, Lady Hermes has always given me energy. If I can be of help, I will do my best." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "E-Everyone~~~~!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes shed tears and hugged Uran. Happily smiling as Uran stroked her head like a child, she beamed with happiness. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0223.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Thank you, everyone! I really love you all!! I’ll contact you again tonight, so please be ready<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0224.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Well then, I’ll go apologize to Daria-chan! Bye-bye<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)

    MSG([[ Saying that, Hermes hurried out of the Japanese-style room. We left behind smiled at her adorable behavior and began planning our strategy. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Daria-san is watching Hermes-san under Mother’s orders. What do you think her objective is...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0473.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hmm, I think Hermes-chan’s mom is just overprotective. She’s the kind of person who grants whatever Hermes-chan asks for." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0304.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I heard that the board of directors had tough negotiations so that Hermes-sama could be allowed irregular attendance like this." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0474.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Well, whatever the case, let’s take Senior Hermes out and make some memories with her!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0475.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Sometimes I can’t come to the academy because of work, so I get how important it is to create memories to share with everyone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes. If she’s with Hermes-san, we can probably hear more about Daria-san too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It had been a month full of anxiety since Daria stopped appearing, but finally we might see hope. ]])

    MSG([[ To fulfill Hermes-san’s wish, we vowed to unite as one. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_06")
end
